ProductInfo.Features:
7 inch 1280*800 IPS HD TFT display for beautiful pictures, 1.6GHZ ATM7029 Quad Core CPU and Vivante GC1000+ GPU, 5 point capacitive touch screen for easy operation.
Dual Camera, one Front Camera 0.3MP, and one Rear Camera 2.0MP.
Super slim (as thin as mini iPad) 7.2mm and fashion metal shell design for high quality life
4K Video Player: One Screen could support 2 videos play
Cool 3D games for your fun life, built in Kid Mod App could let you control your children's use.
ProductInfo.Name: AGPtek® Quad core 7 inch Android 4.1 1.6GHz IPS HD Capacitive Touch Screen Tablet 1280 X 800 with Dual Camera 1GB DDR3 8GB NAND FLASH, Support Wifi G-sensor
